snippet.title: Earth: 9000 Teaser 1
snippet.description:
New indie game Earth: 9000 for PC releasing in early summer of 2020. 

Earth: 9000 a new indie Bullet Hell, Twin Stick, Rogue-Lite mashup. You take the role of the Earth defending itself against a never ending onslaught of alien invaders.  You'll unlock dozens of weapons and even more upgrades as you gain research from defeating enemies. You'll certainly be defeated, but that isn't the end, our patented Reali-time-nsion technology sends your research, weapons and upgrades to a new Earth ready to defend itself once again, but this time with the advantages of everything you've unlocked before.

Join us on our Discord, get a beta key, smash some waves of alien menace, post your waves and get a key for your friend.
https://discord.gg/HrpKuDT

Earth: 9000 is nearly ready to launch, needing some final clean-up and finishing touches. We're looking to release on PC by finding the right online store for us. We'd love to develop some community support as we're a tiny indie, we need all the help we can get. If you know a guy, we're looking for a publisher for marketing assists, 2d art support and some beta testers. 

https://www.secretforestgames.com/
